it.polimi.dei.provafinale.carcassone.model
Class Track

java.lang.Object
  it.polimi.dei.provafinale.carcassone.model.Track

public class Track
extends Object

This class represent a track, a structure to save the elements (street or city) connected.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matteo Danelli

isClosed

public boolean isClosed()
Check if a track is closed. A track is closed if and only if the track has a starting point and an end point.

Returns:
true if track closed, else false.

true if is of type, else false.
